document: CARNEGIE-MELLON UNIVERSITY College of Humanities and Social Sciences DISSERTATION Submitted in Partial Fulfillment of the Requirements For the Degree of DOCTOR OF ARTS Title AMERICAN EXPANSIONIST SENTIMENT AND THE ANNEXATION OF HAWAII Presented by GEORGE FRANKLING PEARCE Accepted by the Department of HISTORY Readers (Director of Dissertation) Date Date Date Approved by the Committee on Graduate Degrees Chairman Date
